translations.chinese: 築甬道，屬河，以取敖倉粟。
translations.english: They built a covered walkway connecting to the Yellow River to obtain grain from Aocang.
King Wei Bao took leave to return and visit his ailing parent.
Upon arriving, he cut off the river crossings and rebelled for Chu.
In the sixth month, King Han returned to Queyang.
On the day renwu, he established the crown prince and pardoned criminals.
